Package transactionmanager

Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
transactionmanager.AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
Account database for storing accounts with helper methods for opening, closing, finding accounts, etc.
Author:
Mohammed Salama, Dakshal Panicker

  • Constructor Details

    • AccountDatabase

      AccountDatabase(Account[] accounts, int numAcct)
      Create a new Accounts Database
      Parameters:
      accounts - initial array
      numAcct - initial number of accounts

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find(Account account)
      Method that searches for an account in the database
      Parameters:
      account - Account to search for
      Returns:
      index of the account in the array if found, otherwise returns -1.

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Method to increase the capacity of the array by 4.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Account account)
      Method that checks if an account is in the database.
      Parameters:
      account - account to search for
      Returns:
      true if found, false otherwise.

    • open

      public boolean open(Account account)
      Method that opens an account (adds account to end of array)
      Parameters:
      account - account to add to database
      Returns:
      true after account is added

    • close

      public boolean close(Account account)
      Method that closes an account (removes account from array)
      Parameters:
      account - account to close/remove
      Returns:
      true after account is removed, false if account is not found

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(Account account)
      Method used to withdraw money from account
      Parameters:
      account - account to withdraw from
      Returns:
      false if amount to withdraw is greater than balance, true otherwise

    • deposit

      public void deposit(Account account)

    • printSorted

      public void printSorted()
      Method to display all the accounts in the account database, sorted by the account types. For the same account type, sort by the account holderâ€™s profile (last name, first name and dob.)

    • compareAccountType

      private int compareAccountType(Account account1, Account account2)
      Method that compares two account types alphabetically
      Parameters:
      account1 - 1st account to compare
      account2 - 2nd account to compare
      Returns:
      result of the comparison

    • printFeesAndInterests

      public void printFeesAndInterests()
      Method to display all the accounts in the account database, the same order with the P command. In addition, display the calculated fees and monthly interests based on current account balances.

    • printUpdatedBalances

      public void printUpdatedBalances()
      Method to update and display the account balance for all accounts by applying the fees and interests earned.
